data.title: List of suicides in the 21st century
data.text:
Name Suicide year Causes and explanations Nikki Bacharach 2007 Daughter of Burt Bacharach and Angie Dickinson, was diagnosed with visual impairment and Asperger syndrome, suffocated[28][29] Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi 2019 Iraqi-born Islamic terrorist and leader of the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant, detonation of a suicide vest[30] Mark Balelo 2013 Cast member on the reality TV series Storage Wars, asphyxiation,[31][32][33] days after an arrest for drug charges. Pratyusha Banerjee 2016 Indian actress, hanging,[34] although her parents speculate that her boyfriend murdered her and staged her suicide Johanna Bassani 2020 Austrian combined Nordic skier and ski jumper[35] Simone Battle 2014 X Factor contestant and member of the pop band G.R.L., hanging,[36] due to depression over financial issues J. Clifford Baxter 2002 American Enron Corporation executive, gunshot[37] Ari Behn 2019 Norwegian author and painter,[38] suffered from depression and other mental health issues, alcoholism, and loneliness Jovan Belcher 2012 American football player, shot himself after killing his girlfriend[39] Jadin Bell 2013 Oregon teen who was taken off life support after he attempted suicide by hanging himself. He was driven to take his own life because he was bullied for being gay, according to his family.[40] Malik Bendjelloul 2014 Swedish documentary filmmaker, jumped in front of moving train,[41][42][43][44] he was struggling with depression Chester Bennington 2017 American singer and songwriter (Linkin Park), hanging, had struggled with substance abuse and depression[45][46] Chris Benoit 2007 Canadian professional wrestler, hanged himself after killing his wife and son; had suffered from dementia, depression, and possible traumatic brain injury[47] Tim Bergling, aka Avicii 2018 Swedish DJ and music producer, self-inflicted cuts resulting in blood loss,[48] suffered from anxiety, alcoholism, drug addiction, and depression David Berman 2019 American musician, singer, poet and cartoonist best known for his work with indie-rock bands the Silver Jews and Purple Mountains, hanging.[49][50][51][52] Previously attempted suicide in 2003, suffered from depression, anxiety, and drug addiction Byron "Reckful" Bernstein 2020 Former professional Esports player – best known for World of Warcraft, pioneer of streaming on Twitch.tv. He battled with depression for more than 20 years.[53][54][55] Paul Bhattacharjee 2013 British actor, jumped from a clifftop a day after he had been declared bankrupt, he suffered from severe depression[56] Brian Bianchini 2004 American male model, hanging,[57] suffered from depression Abraham Biggs 2008 American college student who livestreamed his suicide on the video broadcasting website Justin.tv, overdose of opiates and benzodiazepines[58] He had been struggling with bipolar disorder Steve Bing 2020 American businessman and film producer, jumped from 27th floor of apartment building[59] Bob Birch 2012 American musician; gunshot,[60] he had severe gastrointestinal issues brought on by a 1995 car accident, and suffered from extreme insomnia David Birnie 2005 Australian serial killer and rapist, hanging[61] Jeremy Blake 2007 American artist, drowning,[62] possible motive was harassment from Scientologists Erica Blasberg 2010 American golfer, asphyxia caused by prescription overdose,[63] found with a dust mask on her mouth, and plastic bag over her head Miguel Blesa 2017 Spanish banker and businessman, involved in various corruption scandals, gunshot to chest[64] Isabella Blow 2007 English magazine editor, and muse to fashion designer Alexander McQueen, poisoning,[65] suffered from bipolar disorder, as well as depression after a cancer diagnosis and fading celebrity status Eduardo Bonvallet 2015 Chilean World Cup footballer and pundit, known for his strong opinions, hanging,[66] suffered from depression Novak Bošković 2019 Serbian handball player, gunshot[67] Dmitry Bosov 2020 Russian businessman and billionaire, gunshot[68][69] Stephen "tWitch" Boss 2022 American dancer, self-inflicted gunshot to head[70][71][72][73] Mohamed Bouazizi 2011 Tunisian street vendor, self-immolation,[74] set himself on fire in retaliation for having his wares stolen, and being harassed. His suicide sparked the Tunisian Revolution. Anthony Bourdain 2018 American chef, author, and television personality, hanging,[75] suicide "appeared to be an impulsive act". Jonathan Brandis 2003 American actor, hanging,[76] he was depressed about his career, which had slowly declined in recent years, and he was drinking heavily. Charlie Brandt 2004 American serial killer, hanging[77] Blake Brockington 2015 American LGBT advocate who was the first openly transgender homecoming king in the state of North Carolina, vehicular impact[78] He had been struggling with severe depression Molly Brodak 2020 American poet, writer, and baker,[79] she struggled with depression since childhood Herman Brood 2001 Dutch musician, artist, composer, jumping from the roof of the Hilton Hotel Amsterdam, he was depressed by the failure of his drug rehabilitation program, and was facing serious medical problems due to his prolonged drug use[80][81] Joseph Brooks 2011 American screenwriter, director, producer, and composer known for the song "You Light Up My Life"[82] Brooks had been indicted on multiple rape and sexual assault allegations, but died by suicide before he could be tried. The day after Brooks' death, the medical examiner ruled that Brooks had killed himself, citing asphyxia,[83] he was facing sexual assault charges.[84] Jürgen Brümmer 2014 German Olympic gymnast (1988), jumping from the Körsch Viaduct,[85] Shortly afterwards, his 15-year-old son, who was in need of ongoing care since an accident two years before, was found dead in his home, evidently having been suffocated by Brümmer.[86][87][88] David Buckel 2018 American LGBT rights lawyer and environmental activist, self-immolation in Prospect Park, Brooklyn,[89] set self on fire in protest of the use of fossil fuels Julia Buencamino 2015 15-year-old Filipina actress found hanging from the ceiling of her bedroom’s bathroom with a nylon rope looped around her neck on the night of July 7, 2015.[90] Brad Bufanda 2017 American actor, jumped from building[91] Aaron Bushnell 2024 Member of the United States Air Force, self-immolated in protest of American involvement in the Israel-Hamas war Name Suicide year Causes and explanations Homaro Cantu 2015 American chef, hanging,[92] had no history of depression or mental illness, left no suicide note Capital Steez 2012 American hip-hop artist, unhappy with his career, jumped off the rooftop of the Cinematic Music Group headquarters in Manhattan[93][94] Kagney Linn Karter 2024 American pornographic film actress, suicide with shotgun blast in mouth in Cuyahoga County, Ohio on February 15, 2024. Her death was reported by TMZ four days later.[95] Tim Carter 2008 Footballer, hanging,[96] he was struggling to deal with his son's disabilities Neal Casal 2019 American musician[97] Finn M. W. Caspersen 2009 American financier and philanthropist, gunshot, after battle with cancer and anticipated financial problems[98][99] Ariel Castro 2013 Puerto Rican American man convicted in August 2013 of kidnapping, rape, and aggravated murder for holding Amanda Berry, Michelle Knight, and Gina DeJesus in his Cleveland, Ohio, home over the course of a decade, hanging[100] Fidel Castro Díaz-Balart 2018 Cuban nuclear physicist, son of Fidel Castro,[101] suffered from depression Kelly Catlin 2019 American cyclist, asphyxiation[102] suffered from depression, suffered a concussion months prior to her suicide Antonio Catricalà 2021 Italian civil servant and lawyer, gunshot[103] Champignon 2013 Brazilian musician, bassist for Charlie Brown Jr., gunshot to head,[104] suffered from depression and anxiety, was distraught over criticism, insecurity, and financial struggles Nicole Chan 2019 Canadian police officer who died after making allegations of sexual coercion.[105] Joseph Newton Chandler III 2002 Formerly[106] unidentified identity thief, gunshot[107] Pierre Chanal 2003 French soldier and alleged serial killer Iris Chang 2004 American historian and author of The Rape of Nanking, gunshot wound to the mouth,[108] she had an extreme bout of depression and reactive psychosis Danny Chen 2011 Chinese-American U.S. Army Private, gunshot,[109] he was tortured, harassed, assaulted, and bullied relentlessly by his fellow soldiers for being of Asian descent. Vic Chesnutt 2009 American country-folk singer-songwriter, intentional overdose of muscle relaxants.,[110] was unable to receive insurance due to his quadriplegia following a car accident in 1983, and was $50,000 in debt due to medical bills. Leslie Cheung 2003 Hong Kong singer, jumped off the 24th floor of the hotel Mandarin Oriental, having been diagnosed with severe clinical depression.[111] V. J. Chitra 2020 Indian actress,[112] hanging,[113] her husband was suspected of encouraging her to die by suicide Seung-Hui Cho 2007 American university student who perpetrated the Virginia Tech shooting, gunshot[114] Choi Jin-sil 2008 South Korean actress, hanging,[115] likely due to grief resulting from her friend, Ahn Jae-hwan's, suicide Choi Jin-young 2010 South Korean actor and singer, hanging,[116] suffered from depression after his sister, Choi Jin-sil, died by suicide in 2008. Jin-young had attempted suicide several times, including once by drug overdose in 2009. Chung Doo-un 2019 South Korean politician[117] Brian Christopher 2018 American professional wrestler, hanging,[118][119] found in his cell after being incarcerated for driving under the influence and public intoxication Tyler Clementi 2010 Gay American student at Rutgers University, jumped off the George Washington Bridge after his roommate secretly observed him with a webcam, kissing his date[120] Camila María Concepción 2020 American screenwriter and transgender rights activist[121] Tarka Cordell 2008 British musician, hanging[122] Don Cornelius 2012 American television show host and producer, best known as the creator and host of the nationally syndicated dance/music franchise Soul Train, gunshot. He had been suffering from seizures,[123] possibly suffered from the early stages of dementia or Alzheimer's disease. Chris Cornell 2017 American musician, singer and songwriter (Soundgarden, Audioslave, Temple of the Dog), hanging after performance,[124] suffered from depression, anxiety, and drug addiction. Prescription drugs at therapeutic doses were found in his system. John Coughlin 2019 American figure skater,[125] hanging,[126] was accused of sexual assault, and was accused by more women after his death Julee Cruise 2022 American musician.[127] She struggled with lupus, depression and alcohol and drug addiction.[128] Smiley Culture 2011 English reggae singer and DJ, stabbed himself during police raid Eylül Cansın 2015 Turkish transgender woman who was exploited into sex work, jumping[129] Antonio Calvo 2011 Senior lecturer in Spanish at Princeton University, cut his throat and arms.[130] He died by suicide after being either suspended from the university, or having his employment contract abruptly terminated, as this meant that he would lose his residence visa and possibly face deportation. Chen Gang 2011 Chinese university lecturer, jumping.[131] He died by suicide after losing to a rival, which he attributed to corruption in the university. Name Suicide year Causes and explanations Yasmim Gabrielle Fernandes da Silva 2019 17-year-old Brazilian TV presenter, overdose of sleeping pills, due to depression[132] Charlotte Dawson 2014 Australian TV presenter, died by suicide via hanging [133][134] Brad Delp 2007 American rock musician (Boston), died by suicide via carbon monoxide poisoning after suffering from depression due to lingering hard feelings from Boston's disbandment in the 1980s and personal tension with bandleader Scholz.[135] Ronald Desruelles 2015 Belgian athlete, died by suicide via hanging,[136] he was depressed after the failure of his business Dipendra Bir Bikram Shah 2001 King of Nepal and perpetrator of the Nepalese royal massacre, died by suicide via gunshot to the head[137] Thomas M. Disch 2008 American writer, suicide by gunshot,[138] he suffered from depression following the death of his long-term partner, Charles Naylor. Christopher Dorner 2013 American police officer, suicide by gunshot in Angelus Oaks, California,[139] after killing his former colleagues. He allegedly committed the act in retaliation against his former workplace, after being fired for reporting excessive force Jon Dough 2006 American pornographic actor, hanging,[140] he suffered from depression and alcoholism Edward Downes 2009 English conductor, assisted double suicide with wife Lady Joan Downes at the Dignitas clinic in Switzerland,[141] had suffered from increasing hearing impairment, as well as near total blindness, and his wife had terminal cancer. Scott Dozier 2019 American murderer on death row in Nevada after the 2002 murder of 22-year-old Jeremiah Miller, hanging[142] Charmaine Dragun 2007 Australian television newsreader, jumped off The Gap, an oceanside cliff in Sydney, after a long battle with depression[143] Dave Duerson 2011 American football player, gunshot,[144] posthumous research of his brain found chronic traumatic encephalopathy after years of concussions in his football career Clay Duke 2010 American ex-convict, gunshot, opened fire on the Panama City school board during a meeting after his wife, Rebecca, who was a teacher in the school district, was fired. After getting hit by a bullet from a security officer's pistol, Duke collapsed and then used a remaining bullet in his gun to kill himself.[145] Theresa Duncan 2007 American video game designer, blogger, filmmaker, and critic. Her partner Jeremy Blake also died by suicide. The couple were both being harassed by Scientologists prior to their deaths. Aleksandr Dolmatov 2013 Russian opposition activist and asylum seeker, undisclosed method.[146] He was found dead by suicide in a deportation centre in the Netherlands, after being denied political asylum, which he was seeking in order to avoid arrest in Russia due to his participation in the 2011-2013 Russian protests. Denice Denton 2006 American professor of electrical engineering, academic administrator, and ninth chancellor of the University of California, Santa Cruz, jumped 33 stories off of The Paramount.[147] She died by suicide one day after being released from a psychiatric institute, where she had been treated for depression. She had been harassed and threatened a year prior. Name Suicide year Causes and explanations Goo Hara 2019 South Korean singer and actress, former member of K-Pop group Kara, found dead at her home after being cyber-bullied by malicious commenters, due to a scandal that involved her and her abusive ex-boyfriend. It was confirmed in 2019 that she was suffering from depression. She was also being neglected by her mother who abandoned her family when Goo was a child.[173][174] Anthony Galindo 2020 Venezuelan singer,[175] he suffered from depression, apparently due to the frequent cancellations of his shows following the COVID-19 pandemic Alan Garcia 2019 Peruvian president, gunshot,[176] was to be arrested for involvement in the Odebrecht scandal Jamir Garcia 2020 Filipino singer, vocalist of the band Slapshock, hanging[177] Santiago García 2021 Uruguayan soccer player, gunshot,[178] had been receiving psychiatric treatment John Geddert 2021 American gymnastics coach, gunshot,[179] shortly after being charged with 24 felony counts related to sexual abuse of his trainees[180] Babak Ghorbani 2014 Iranian wrestler, overdose,[181] was charged with murder in 2012, which is a possible factor that led to his suicide Sam Gillespie 2003 Australian philosopher whose writings and translations were crucial to the initial reception of Alain Badiou's work in the English-speaking world[182] Jeremy Giambi 2022 American professional baseball player, gunshot,[183] suffered from depression and paranoia after being struck in the head by a baseball about six months before his death Joe Gliniewicz 2015 American police officer, gunshot; facing the exposure of his criminal activity, he staged his suicide under the guise of being killed by three unknown men[184] John Wayne Glover 2005 Australian serial killer, hanging.[185] Jean-Luc Godard 2022 French-Swiss film director and film critic; assisted suicide procedure.[186][187] David Goodall 2018 English-born Australian botanist and ecologist, physician-assisted suicide[188] Lucy Gordon 2009 British actress and model, hanging after an argument with her boyfriend, cinematographer Jerome Alveras[189] Gōri Daisuke 2010 Japanese voice actor, narrator and actor, cut his wrist,[190] was depressed about fading vision caused by diabetes, which hindered his ability to work Sophie Gradon 2018 English model and television personality, hanging,[191] possibly due to cyberbullying Bob Grant 2003 English actor, carbon monoxide poisoning,[192] suffered from depression, bipolar disorder, and other mental health issues, was also struggling with debt and lack of work Spalding Gray 2004 American actor, playwright, screenwriter, performance artist, and monologuist, jumped off the Staten Island Ferry,[193] was severely injured and depressed after a car accident in 2001 Mark Green 2004 American record-setting minor league hockey star, hanged himself after being accused of stealing from a car dealership Paul Gruchow 2004 American writer, drug overdose,[194] suffered from depression Name Suicide year Causes and explanations Charles Haddon 2010 lead singer of British synthpop band Ou Est le Swimming Pool, was found hanging in a car park backstage after injuring a fan during a stage dive[195] Christopher James Hardman, aka Lil' Chris 2015 British singer-songwriter, actor, and television personality, died on 23 March 2015 at his Lowestoft home in England at the age of 24. Recorded as suicide by a coroner.[196] Death by hanging.[197] Charlie Haeger 2020 American baseball player, gunshot,[198] died by suicide after the suspected murder of his ex-girlfriend Haesoo, born Kim A-ra 2023 29-year-old South Korean trot singer found dead in a hotel room with a suicide note on 12 May 2023. Undisclosed method.[199] Jason Hairston 2018 American football player,[200] was found to have been suffering from chronic traumatic encephalopathy Ryan Halligan 2003 Vermont high school student who died of suicide due to bullying, hanging[201] Tony Halme 2010 Finnish athlete, actor and politician, gunshot[202] David Hamilton 2016 British photographer and filmmaker known for his nudes of pubescent girls, asphyxiation via plastic bag after one of his models accused him of rape[203] Neda Hassani 2003 Iranian protester, self-immolation in front of French embassy in London[204] Marvin Heemeyer 2004 American welder who went on a rampage with a modified bulldozer, gunshot[205] Sarah Hegazi 2020 Egyptian LGBT activist,[206] suffered from PTSD after being tortured in prison for flying a rainbow flag Benjamin Hendrickson 2006 American actor, gunshot[207] Victor Heringer 2018 Brazilian novelist and poet who won the Prêmio Jabuti in 2013, jumped from the window of his apartment,[208] suffered from depression for most of his life Aaron Hernandez 2017 American football player and convicted murderer, died of suicide by hanging in his prison cell[209] Paul Hester 2005 Australian television personality and drummer from Crowded House, hanged himself in a Melbourne park; he had split from the mother of his two daughters and had been suffering from depression for a number of years.[210] John Hicklenton 2010 British comics artist,[211] suffered from multiple sclerosis Crash Holly 2003 American wrestler, asphyxia due to pulmonary aspiration as a result of overdose of alcohol and drug overdose[212] Ludwig Hirsch 2011 Austrian singer, songwriter and actor, jumped from the second floor of a hospital window while being treated for lung cancer[213] Brandon Hixon 2018 American politician, gunshot. He killed himself before he was convicted of "sexual abuse allegations"[214] Alec Holowka 2019 Canadian video game programmer, designer, and musician,[215] died by suicide after suffering from mood and personality disorders Tyler Honeycutt 2018 American basketball player (Sacramento Kings, Khimki), gunshot.,[216][217] had been struggling with a nitrous oxide addiction, had trouble adjusting to life in Russia Harry Horse 2007 English author, illustrator, cartoonist and musician, stabbed himself 47 times in a murder-suicide[218] Silvio Horta 2020 American screenwriter and television producer, gunshot[219] Blake Hounshell 2023 Journalist and editor who worked for The New York Times, Politico, and Foreign Policy Hu Bo 2017 Chinese novelist and director[220][221] Nicholas Hughes 2009 Fisheries biologist, son of renowned poet Sylvia Plath, hanged himself after a long struggle with depression[222] Scott Hutchison 2018 Singer of Scottish band Frightened Rabbit, body was found in a marina in Port Edgar, died after a long and public struggle with depression and anxiety[223] Name Suicide year Causes and explanations Antonie Kamerling 2010 Dutch actor and musician, had been depressed[249] Chris Kanyon 2010 American professional wrestler, overdose of anti-depressant pills,[250] suffered from bipolar disorder, had attempted suicide in 2003 Kazuhiko Katō 2009 Japanese musician, hanging[251] David Kellermann 2009 American businessman and CFO of Freddie Mac, suicide by hanging.[252] Mike Kelley 2012 American artist[253] had been depressed Israel Keyes 2012 American serial killer, suicide by self-inflicted wounds and suffocation[254] Jiah Khan 2013 British-American actress who appeared in Bollywood movies, hanging[citation needed], her boyfriend was accused of staging her suicide Sahar Khodayari 2019 Iranian activist who self-immolated in front of the Islamic Revolutionary Court of Tehran[255] Margot Kidder 2018 Canadian-American actress, known for her role as Lois Lane in Superman feature films, drug and alcohol overdose,[256] suffered from bipolar disorder, was temporarily paralyzed in a car accident Daul Kim 2009 South Korean model and blogger, hanged in her Paris apartment,[257] suffered from insomnia, depression, and loneliness, struggled with the pressures of the fashion industry Kim Ji-hoon 2013 South Korean singer-songwriter (Two Two) and actor, hanging[258] Kim Jong-hyun 2017 South Korean singer and songwriter, best known for being a member of K-pop boy band SHINee,[259] suicide by carbon monoxide poisoning,[260] had suffered depression. Yu-ri Kim 2011 South Korean model, poison,[261] likely suffered from grief from the passing of her father in early 2011, had also lost her mother prior to her father's death Hana Kimura 2020 Japanese wrestler and reality show participant, died by suicide through hydrogen sulfide poisoning after having been cyber-bullied[262][263] Uday Kiran 2014 Telugu actor, hanging,[264][265][266] he had suffered from depression due to financial crisis for almost a year Stan Kirsch 2020 American actor, hanging[267] R. B. Kitaj 2007 American artist; suffocation,[268] likely suffered from grief John Kivela 2017 American politician, hanging,[269] struggled with alcoholism Billy Knight 2018 UCLA basketball player, self-inflicted blunt force injuries from jumping from a building,[270] arrested for child molestation, struggled with mental health issues Jak Knight 2022 American comedian and TV writer, gunshot[271] Andrew Koenig 2010 Actor known as Boner on the American sitcom Growing Pains, and the son of Star Trek actor Walter Koenig, hanging[272] Hannelore Kohl 2001 German wife of German Chancellor Helmut Kohl, overdose of sleeping pills,[273] suffered from photodermatitis Takako Konishi 2001 Japanese office worker known for an urban legend surrounding her death, froze to death,[274] struggled with grief after losing her job, which was a factor of her alcoholism Ruslana Korshunova 2008 Kazakhstani model, aged 20, jumped from the ninth-floor balcony of her apartment in New York City[275] Oleksandr Kovalenko 2010 Ukrainian football player and referee, jumped from his apartment[276] Tim Kretschmer 2009 German student and mass shooter, gunshot[277] Norbert Kröcher 2016 German 2 June Movement terrorist, gunshot[278] Cheslie Kryst 2022 American model who won Miss USA in 2019, Jumped from the 9th floor of her apartment building,[279] suffered from depression Ashwani Kumar 2020 Indian police officer and politician who served as governor of Nagaland from 2013 to 2014, hanging[280] Hsu Kun-yuan 2020 Taiwanese politician, jumped off the roof of his apartment[281] Name Suicide year Causes and explanations Paul Lambert 2020 British television journalist, producer and communications director[282] Lil Loaded 2021 American rapper, self-inflicted gunshot wound, was upset after a break up with his girlfriend Karen Lancaume 2005 French pornographic film actress, overdose of temazepam[283] Adam Lanza 2012 Perpetrator of the Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting, gunshot to the head[284] Don Lapre 2011 American television pitchman noted for several products, cut throat with a razor blade[285] Lee Eun-ju 2005 South Korean actress, slit wrists and hanging,[286] suffered from depression, as well as insomnia after doing nude scenes in the film The Scarlet Letter Lee Hye-Ryeon 2007 South Korean singer, known as U;Nee, hanging,[287] suffered from depression and stress Jon Lee 2002 drummer of British rock band (Feeder) hanging[288] Lee Sun-kyun 2023 South Korean actor, found dead in his car after leaving a suicide note for his wife. He was being investigated for drug use, which may have been the motivation. Carbon monoxide poisoning.[289] Friedrich Leibacher 2001 Swiss mass murderer, gunshot[290] Dave Lepard 2006 lead singer and guitarist (Crashdïet)[291] by hanging, after a struggle with depression Andrzej Lepper 2011 Polish politician who was the leader of Samoobrona RP (Self-Defense of the Republic of Poland) hanging. Arnie Lerma 2018 American former Scientologist and critic of Scientology, gunshot[292] Harry Lew 2011 A US Marine who was a victim of hazing, gunshot.[293] Chris Lighty 2012 American music industry executive and manager,[294] gunshot; he had been involved in an argument with his ex-wife not long before his body was discovered. Mark Linkous 2010 American musician, gunshot to the heart.,[295] suffered from depression, as well as grief after the suicide of his close friend Vic Chestnutt, was in the process of splitting from his wife of 19 years Carlo Lizzani 2013 Italian film director, jumped from the balcony of his home.[296] Kevin James Loibl 2016 Assassin of Christina Grimmie, gunshot to the head[297] Bernard Loiseau 2003 French chef, shotgun blast to the head,[298] unknown motive, likely due to depression Ellen Joyce Loo 2018 Canadian-Hong Kong musician, singer, songwriter, and co-founder of the folk-pop rock group at 17, fall from her high-rise apartment building.,[299][300][301] suffered from bipolar disorder Andreas Lubitz 2015 Co-pilot of Germanwings Flight 9525, plane crash,[302] suffered from a "psychosomatic illness", and psychotic depression, was deemed unfit to fly an aircraft by a doctor due to his suicidal tendencies Roman Lyashenko 2003 Russian NHL hockey player, hanged himself with a belt.[303] David Lytton 2015 A formerly unidentified British man found on Saddleworth Moor, strychnine poisoning,[304] suffered from depression Fathima Latheef 2019 Indian post-graduate student, hanging.[305] She died by suicide, citing religious discrimination by her professors as her motive in her suicide note. Name Suicide year Causes and explanations Pua Magasiva 2019 Samoan-born New Zealand actor, was convicted of assaulting his wife 15 days before his death, violent imagery and writings were found in his journal Bhaiyyu Maharaj 2018 Indian spiritual guru, gunshot[306] Sean Malone 2020 American bassist[307] Mădălina Manole 2010 Romanian pop singer, pesticide poisoning[308] Michael Mantenuto 2017 American actor (Miracle), self-inflicted gunshot wound[309] Michael Marin 2012 American businessman, cyanide pill,[310] died by suicide after being convicted of arson Andrew Martinez 2006 Nudism activist who became known on the University of California, Berkeley campus as the "Naked Guy", suffocation,[311] struggled with declining mental health and homelessness Williams Martínez 2021 Uruguayan soccer player,[312] struggled with depression due to COVID-19 related inactivity Tadahiro Matsushita 2012 Japanese politician, hanging[citation needed] David Edward Maust 2006 American serial killer, hanging[313] Jacques Mayol 2001 French free diver and subject of the movie The Big Blue, hanging[314] John McAfee 2021

British-American businessman and computer programmer, hanging. He died by suicide after facing tax evasion charges. His death generated conspiracy theories, and his wife claimed it was staged.[315]

Allyson McConnell 2013 Australian-Canadian woman who killed her two children,[316] jumped off a bridge while in Australia,[317] struggled with depression, had attempted suicide earlier in her life after being raped by her father Mindy McCready 2013 American country music singer, gunshot.,[318][319] had struggled with substance abuse and legal problems Chris McKinstry 2006 Canadian artificial intelligence researcher,[320] likely suffered from depression Kenny McKinley 2010 American football player, gunshot,[321] struggled with depression due to debt, injury, and his post-football career John B. McLemore 2015 American horologist and subject of the podcast S-Town, ingested potassium cyanide[citation needed] Alexander McQueen 2010 British fashion designer and couturier, hanged himself in his wardrobe,[322] he had been diagnosed with mixed anxiety and depressive disorder, and took an overdose prior to hanging himself[323] Megan Meier 2006 American high school student who died of suicide due to cyberbullying, hanging.[324] Adolf Merckle 2009 German entrepreneur and billionaire, suicide by train,[325] the motive for his suicide was financial loss during the economic crisis of 2007-2008 Jill Messick 2018 American film producer,[326][327] method not disclosed,[328] was a victim of cyberbullying Katie Meyer 2022 US soccer player, method not disclosed[329][330] Flávio Migliaccio 2020 Brazilian actor, film director and screenwriter, hanging[331] Filip Minarik 2023 Czech jockey, committed suicide three years after sustaining serious head injuries, method not disclosed[332] Haruma Miura 2020 Japanese actor, hanging. He had written in his notebook about his struggles with anxiety and suicidal thoughts Shizuka Miura 2010 Japanese doll maker and musician, possibly related to medication.[333][334] Dave Mirra 2016 American BMX rider, gunshot,[335] was posthumously diagnosed with chronic traumatic encephalopathy Mario Monicelli 2010 Italian film director, jumped out of a hospital window[336] he was admitted a few days earlier for prostate cancer.[337][338] Moonbin 2023 South Korean singer and actor, member of the K-Pop group Astro and its sub-unit Moonbin & Sanha, found dead at his home on the night of 19 April 2023. Undisclosed method.[339] Ronald Lee Moore 2008 American fugitive and suspected serial killer, hanging[340][341] A. R. Morlan 2016 American author,[342] she had dyslexia, arthritis, and Asperger syndrome Gray Morrow 2001 American comics artist and illustrator, gunshot,[343] suffered from Parkinson's disease Jason Moss 2006 American attorney and author of The Last Victim, gunshot,[344] struggled with depression Miljan Mrdaković 2020 Serbian footballer, gunshot[345] Ian Murdock 2015 American software engineer and founder of the Debian distribution of the GNU/Linux operating system, hanging[346][347][348] Uwe Mundlos 2011 German National Socialist Underground terrorist, gunshot[349] Ronnie McNutt 2020 American Toyota plant worker and former veteran who livestreamed his suicide, which subsequently went viral; gunshot under the chin[350] Alec Musser 2024 American actor and fitness model, shot himself in the chest with a shotgun.[351] Name Suicide year Causes and explanations Stephen Paddock 2017 Perpetrator of the 2017 Las Vegas shooting, gunshot. Paddock shot and killed 60 concert goers from the window of the Mandalay Bay Hotel before shooting and killing himself.[365] Tommy Page 2017 American singer-songwriter, hanging[366] Ali-Reza Pahlavi 2011 Prince of Iran and the youngest son of Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, Shah of Iran, and his third wife, Farah Pahlavi. After a long period of depression, on 4 January 2011, Alireza died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound.[367] Leila Pahlavi 2001 Princess of Iran and the youngest daughter of Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, Shah of Iran, and his third wife, Farah Pahlavi, barbiturate (Seconal) overdose, struggled with anorexia nervosa and bulimia nervosa Miko Palanca 2019 Filipino actor, jump from building,[368] suffered from depression related to his love life Brodie Panlock 2006 Australian waitress from Melbourne, jumping from a multilevel carpark in Hawthorn. Her suicide was attributed to severe workplace bullying at the cafe where she worked. Park Yong-ha 2010 South Korean actor and singer, hanging,[369] struggled with maintaining his career, was also struggling with his father's cancer diagnosis Park Won-soon 2020 South Korean activist, lawyer and Mayor of Seoul,[370][371] motive for his suicide was likely due to sexual harassment allegations against him Rehtaeh Parsons 2013 Canadian high school student who was bullied at school and online after images of her alleged gang rape were distributed online by its perpetrators, hanging[372] Darrin Patrick 2020 American author and pastor, gunshot[373] Mark Pavelich 2021 American hockey player, asphyxia,[374] possibly suffered from chronic traumatic encephalopathy, accidentally killed his friend at age 18 Jeret "Speedy" Peterson 2011 American skier, Olympic medalist, gunshot,[375] struggled with depression and alcoholism due to child sexual abuse, and the death of his sister in 1987 Ed Piskor 2024 American cartoonist and podcast host, died by suicide after accusations of sexual misconduct[376] Lawrence Phillips 2016 American football player, hanged himself in his prison cell. Phillips had been accused of murdering his cellmate in April 2015, and prosecutors had considered seeking the death penalty.[377] Kailia Posey 2022 American beauty pageant contestant and reality television personality who died by suicide after a breakup. Hanging.[378] Randy Potter 2017 American former missing person, gunshot[379] Hayden Poulter 2018 New Zealand serial killer, method not disclosed[380] Josh Powell 2012 American main suspect in the disappearance of his wife Susan Powell, blew up his house with him and his children inside[381] Slobodan Praljak 2017 Bosnian Croat General, poison. Praljak drank a small bottle of potassium cyanide in the courtroom of the International Criminal Tribunal at The Hague after being convicted of war crimes.[382] Phoebe Prince 2010 American high school student who died of suicide due to school bullying and cyberbullying, hanging.[383] Wolfgang Přiklopil 2006 Austrian-Czech communications technician who kidnapped a young girl named Natascha Kampusch in 1998. When she escaped after 8 years of captivity, he commited suicide by jumping in front of a train. Kushal Punjabi 2019 Indian actor, hanging,[384] he suffered from depression Jacques Picoux 2016 Gay French-language university lecturer in Taiwan, undisclosed method.[385] He died by suicide after finding out that he would be prohibited from making medical decisions on behalf of his same-sex partner, nor would he have rights to the house the two shared, as their relationship was not legally recognized. Audrie Pott 2012 American high school student, hanging.[386] She had been sexually assaulted at a party, with the footage being uploaded online and shared between students. After the footage spread through her high school, Audrie suffered bullying and sexual harassment. William Parente 2009 American real estate attorney, murdered his wife and two daughters, hanging[387] Name Suicide year Causes and explanations Jun Sadogawa 2013 Japanese manga artist, hanging[422] Rashaan Salaam 2016 American football player, gunshot wound to the head.[423] He suffered from depression. He possibly suffered from chronic traumatic encephalopathy; his family declined brain tests that would have confirmed this.
